TopicTitle: Polish space program, it's not a joke, It's really was once such a thing, :D

Articles.Content:
I mean "meteor" sounding rocket program, unfortunately your "soviet borthers" forced poland to kill it:( They fear about their own rocket monopoly in former Eastern Block

You really were a space program?

This makes no sense.

BTW: Install spellchecker, cause it looks like not only you have problems with basic grammar, but also spelling.

You really were a space program?

This makes no sense.

BTW: Install spellchecker, cause it looks like not only you have problems with basic grammar, but also spelling.

It was not a real space program, only rocket research program, which could be the seed of the space program, but "Soviet comrades" did not like the idea:D , instead offered our researchers and scientist to the possibility of cooperation in the framework of the Intercosmos.

I don't know, title of your topic clearly states that you were a space program:

Polish space program, it's not a joke, I really was once such a thing,

So... how was it to be a space program?

And I don't know why anyone would think about it as a joke - Poland had his own astronaut, is an ESA member, and for many years cooperated with both: ESA and NASA on development of various components for the space crafts (even Rosetta got one of it's instruments designed and build in Poland). Nothing to joke about, really.

http://i.imgur.com/dTEO1.png

Poland CAN into space!
